Reviews.Title: “Good Value as for Rome”

Reviews.Content: ive booked night passing rome couldnt else hundreds euro negative unlucky position tourist gra anagnina metro station couple minutes taxy ive located external bit corner windows garden preferred anythingand wifi didnt found king bed desk writing lcd tv clean ac bathroom night emergency conditions expected couldnt try breakfast leaving prepared warm coffee nicer especially leaving 15 min buffet

Reviews.Title: “Good value of money with reasonable service”

Reviews.Content: located rome cheaper price shuttle bus service anagnina subway station central rome 25 min limited seats shuttle bus it’s wise book ahead rome night shuttle bus finish 1915 hrs front office arrange taxi shuttle night front staff helpful english speaking okay balcony toilet acceptable breakfast limited fill hotel it’s industrial sleep reasonable price recommend rome train station shuttle bus scenery railway
